languages.text: "Довольно игр в благородство, господин Винтерскейл". {n}Хейнрикс тянет оружие из ножен, воздух вокруг него холодеет.{/n} "И, будьте любезны, отойдите в сторону, пока вас не задело".

"Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."
languages.original_text: "Довольно игр в благородство, господин Винтерскейл". {n}Хейнрикс тянет оружие из ножен, воздух вокруг него холодеет.{/n} "И, будьте любезны, отойдите в сторону, пока вас не задело".

traits.locale_text: "Stop playing the knight, Master Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."
"Stop playing the knight, Master Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

"Enough with this feigned nobility, Master Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

"Enough with this feigned nobility, Master Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

"Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

"Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

languages.text: "Schluss mit diesem vorgetäuschten Edelmut, Lord Winterzunder!" {n}Heinrix zieht seine Waffe, während die Luft um ihn herum einzufrieren beginnt.{/n} "Und nun tretet freundlicherweise zur Seite, bevor Ihr ins Kreuzfeuer geratet."
languages.original_text: "Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

traits.locale_text: "Schluss mit diesem vorgetäuschten Edelmut, Meister Winterzunder!" {n}Heinrix zieht seine Waffe, während die Luft um ihn herum einzufrieren beginnt.{/n} "Und nun tretet freundlicherweise zur Seite, bevor Ihr ins Kreuzfeuer geratet."

languages.text: « Cette fausse grandeur a assez duré, seigneur Winterscale. » {n}Heinrix sort son arme et l'air commence à se refroidir autour de lui.{/n} « Maintenant, je vous demande de bien vouloir vous écarter avant de vous prendre une balle perdue. »
languages.original_text: "Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

traits.locale_text: « Cette fausse grandeur a assez duré, maître Winterscale. » {n}Heinrix sort son arme et l'air commence à se refroidir autour de lui.{/n} « Maintenant, je vous demande de bien vouloir vous écarter avant de vous prendre une balle perdue. »

languages.text: “这场贵族之间的友好寒暄可以结束了，温特斯凯尔大人。”{n}海因里希拔出武器，周围的空气变得冰冷。{/n}“请你让开一下，以免枪弹无眼。”
languages.original_text: "Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

traits.locale_text: “这场贵族之间的友好寒暄可以结束了，温特斯凯尔大师。”{n}海因里希拔出武器，周围的空气变得冰冷。{/n}“请你让开一下，以免枪弹无眼。”

languages.text: 「気高さを装うのはもうたくさんだ、ウィンタースケール卿」{n}ハインリックスが武器を取ると、周囲の空気が凍りだす。{/n}「戦いに巻き込まれる前にどいてくれないか」
languages.original_text: "Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

traits.locale_text: 「高貴ぶるのはもうたくさんだ、マスター・ウィンタースケール」」{n}ハインリックスが武器を取ると、周囲の空気が凍りだす。{/n}「巻き込まれる前にどいてくれたら助かるんだが」
「気高さを装うのはもうたくさんだ、ウィンタースケール卿」{n}ハインリックスが武器を取ると、周囲の空気が凍りだす。{/n}「戦いに巻き込まれる前にどいてくれないか」

languages.text: «Basta de falsas noblezas, lord Winterscale». {n}Heinrix saca su arma y el aire que le rodea comienza a congelarse.{/n} «Y si no le importa, échese a un lado para que no le alcancen los disparos».
languages.original_text: "Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

traits.locale_text: «Basta de falsas noblezas, maestro Winterscale». {n}Heinrix saca su arma y el aire que le rodea comienza a congelarse.{/n} «Y si no le importa, échese a un lado para que no le alcancen los disparos».

languages.text: "Asaletin bu kadarı yersiz Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix, etrafındaki hava donmaya başlarken silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Ayrıca iki ateş arasında kalmamak için kenara çekilmenizi rica edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Enough with this feigned nobility, Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix draws his weapon as the air around him begins to freeze.{/n} "And if you could kindly step aside before you are caught in the crossfire."

traits.locale_text: "Asaletin bu kadarı yersiz Lord Winterscale." {n}Heinrix, etrafındaki hava donmaya başlarken silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Ayrıca iki ateş arasında kalmamak için kenara çekilmenizi rica edeceğim."
